#summary The hr clear attribute is a deprecated method of clearing certain styles.
#labels about-html,is-html-attribute

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > [HrElement <hr> element] > *clear attribute*

== Usage ==

See [AddressClearAttribute <address clear>] for usage information and examples.

== Elements ==

You can use the `clear` attribute on the following elements:

  * [AddressElement <address>]
  * [BlockquoteElement <blockquote>]
  * [BrElement <br>]
  * [DdElement <dd>]
  * [DirElement <dir>]
  * [DivElement <div>]
  * [DlElement <dl>]
  * [DtElement <dt>]
  * [HrElement <hr>]
  * [LiElement <li>]
  * [MenuElement <menu>]
  * [OlElement <ol>]
  * [PElement <p>]
  * [PreElement <pre>]
  * [TableElement <table>]
  * [UlElement <ul>]
